objectDesc.p: Ostracon, ?x?, 1 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 1 line(s) per column, 19 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: Discovered at Miṣr written on a lamp.
Obtained by Museo Egizio di Torino (Egyptian Museum of Turin) at Torino, Italia.

msIdentifier.msName: no. 4761, Museo Egizio di Torino (Egyptian Museum of Turin), Torino, Italia.

sourceDesc.bibl: Lefebvre, Gustave, Recueil des inscriptions grecques-chrétiennes d'Égypte, no. 749, p. 750, Institut Francais d'Archeologie Orientale du Caire: Le Caire, Égypte, 1907. OCLC 7065867.
